# Spatial Hashing Approximate Gaussian Processes


[![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/shag.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/shag/)
[![python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/shag.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/shag/)
